ie.gmit.db

Class ObjectStorageAccessController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.db.ObjectStorageAccessController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ObjectStorageAccessController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable class using a BlockingQueue to control access Object Database. Maintains a cached list of Document objects from the database.
    Version:
    1.0b
    Author:
    RnDMizeD
